tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_locations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE gps_trackers (
    tracker_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
    latitude DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    longitude DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE gps_tracker_locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  start_latitude FLOAT,
  start_longitude FLOAT,
  end_latitude FLOAT,
  end_longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
  location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tracker_id UUID REFERENCES trackers(tracker_id),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE trackers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    driver_id INT,
    start_location_id INT,
    end_location_id INT,
    start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    end_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
